name: meta
description: Object containing options for the meta navigation.

params.name: visuallyHiddenTitle
params.description: Title for a meta item section. Defaults to 'Support links'.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add to the meta section of the footer, which will appear below any links specified using meta.items.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add to the meta section of the footer, which will appear below any links specified using meta.items. If meta.html is specified, this option is ignored.

params.name: items
params.description: Array of items for use in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: text
params.description: List item text in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: href
params.description: List item href attribute in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor in the footer meta section.

name: navigation
description: Array of items for use in the navigation section of the footer.

params.name: columns
params.description: Amount of columns to display items in navigation section of the footer.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of each navigation section in the footer. Defaults to full width. You can pass any design system grid width here, for example, 'one-third'; 'two-thirds'; 'one-half'.

params.name: items
params.description: Array of items to display in the list in navigation section of the footer.

params.name: text
params.description: List item text in the navigation section of the footer.

params.name: href
params.description: List item href attribute in the navigation section of the footer. Both `text` and `href` attributes need to be present to create a link.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor in the footer navigation section.

name: containerClasses
description: Classes that can be added to the inner container, useful if you want to make the footer full width.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the footer component container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer component container.
